short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub E-mail Getter is a simple chrome extension to extract the e-mail associated with the commits of a GitHub user

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub E-mail Getter is a simple chrome extension taht extracts the e-mail associated with GIT commits of a GitHub user. Based on GitHub username or URL, if the user's e-mail is public, the extension finds it, so you can contact the user by e-mail.
